spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The one-eyed shiver is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Chilling Mist
entries: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye of Frost
entries: The one-eyed shiver casts {@spell ray of frost} from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also {@condition restrained}. A target {@condition restrained} in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a {@dc 13} Strength check.
